title: S1 Ep1: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Episode 1 - Adnan's Day (Relaunch)
itunes:title: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Episode 1 - Adnan's Day (Relaunch)
description:
May 11, 2020 / Rabia, Susan and Colin go over all the evidence that lays out where Adnan Syed was on the day that Hae Min Lee was murdered, January 13, 1999. Contrary to popular belief, and the Serial podcast, much of Adnan's day was accounted for.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by Betterhelp.
